text: Vicente Juan Segura (22 May 1955 â€“ 11 October 2024) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate. He was the bishop of Ibiza from 14 May 2005 until 18 January 2020. He was the auxiliary bishop of Valencia from 18 January 2020 until his resignation on 25 February 2023. He was born in Tavernes de la Valldigna, Spain. Juan Segura died on 11 October 2024 at a hospital in Valencia, Spain from problems caused by kidney failure at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:People from Valencia
title: Vicente Juan Segura
